title: Im done playing league.
body:
Ok so I came of a two week ban. Played some awesome games then had one bad game. I did not int. I did not even flame. yet I get Permed... 

I want to actually play the game not get permed for legit no reason. 

Game 1
Mr X: omg im high on caffeine
Mr X: \holy
Mr X: shoulda banned twitch
Mr X: gg
Mr X: im over it
Mr X: vsing a twitch is vsing cancer
Mr X: yea but now im behind like anything
Mr X: can cs coz of twotch and lux
Mr X: cant
Mr X: ffs
Mr X: im done
Mr X: gg
Mr X: so tilted
Mr X: i have 2 amazing games
Mr X: to have a shiiiit one
Mr X: no its not
Mr X: its twitch
Mr X: and lux
Mr X: both are oom
Mr X: it emabarassing to need help every 2 seconds
Mr X: hekp'
Mr X: i need help
Mr X: im done
Mr X: sorry
Mr X: they are ganging up on me for some reason
Mr X: dont salt me
Mr X: i wont take it
Mr X: im normally better
Mr X: \ffs
Mr X: ffs
Mr X: the twitch is fuking broken
Mr X: invisible plus so much dmg
Mr X: my games over
Mr X: i need
Mr X: HELP
Mr X: ggwp
Mr X: ok
Mr X: id love to flame
Mr X: but i just came off a two week ban
Mr X: so consider yourself warned
Mr X: im tilted ccoz i did so well last few games
Mr X: just ff
Mr X: 7/19
Mr X: gg
Mr X: never play twitch again
Mr X: for the fairness of league
Mr X: pls
Mr X: games over
Mr X: why prolongue it
Mr X: we cannot win
Mr X: yea twitch is broken
Mr X: im not inting
Mr X: im  over this game
Mr X: i dont get it
Mr X: how can i play two amazing games yet have this game fall to pieces
Mr X: i know why
Mr X: stfu
Mr X: lol watever
Mr X: the only reason im not doing well is that twitch vs tristana doesnt work
Mr X: then you got lux
Mr X: then you got the ganks
Mr X: 1 after the other
Mr X: just ff
Mr X: wtf
Mr X: laggg
Mr X: just ff
Mr X: tahm
Mr X: your saying their better than me?
Mr X: your kidding me right
Mr X: wtf
Mr X: htfu and end
Mr X: yea
Mr X: banning twitch every game now
Mr X: too op of a champ
Mr X: wait what
Mr X: Just end

I cannot say that this chat is completely "Nice words"  But I never flamed anyone, nor did I intentionally feed.

I'm going to file a ticket but I honestly do not believe this constitutes a perm.
